text: The typewriter is a small piano with round keys. There will be great virtuosos from the typewriter. They will be people with long foreheads and melancholy eyes. On moon nights. Sonatas are. And at night. And the gigs. They'll vibrate the typewriters. And his rhythm under the stars will fill our soul with desires and memories. Bells are ringing, 1926
title: Música de mañana
author: Luis Vidales
